author: Fextralife
description:
Code Vein 2 Gameplay Impressions - Is It BETTER Than the FIRST GAME??
In this video, I'm going to be talking about my hands on impressions with Code Vein 2. I was graciously invited to Lyon, France, the headquarters of Bandai Namco Europe in December. Got to play about 2-3 hours or so while I was there. So I want to talk a bit about what I like about the game, what I don't like about it, and also what similarities and difference it has to the first title.

Code Vein 2 Wiki: https://codevein2.wiki.fextralife.com/Code+Vein+2+Wiki
